name: .IRCP File Extension
summary: Learn about .IRCP files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open IRCP files with Adobe SpeedGrade (Windows and macOS) by clicking the "Open SpeedGrade Project" icon in the toolbar in the upper-left corner of the workspace.

NOTE: Since IRCP files are saved in the XML standard, you can also open and edit them with an XML or text editor. Keep in mind that an IRCP file will not appear the same in a text or XML editor compared to SpeedGrade.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
